game:blockdesc-torchholder-brass-*: Can be used to place torches inside, which will never burn out.
xskills:blockdesc-cage-*: Requires the Catcher perk from the Husbandry skill to craft or use.
game:characterdesc-rogue:
Slipping through the shadows, avoiding the Beasts that roam the lands.Far from the life you once had, but the only one you know of now.

The Beasts have taught many lessons in stealth, ranged and melee combat. Constant movement keeps your weight down, keeping you light on your feet but less hardy.
game:characterdesc-druid:
None shall taint our forests for as long as We remain.

Druids are protectors of the forests, masters of nature. They fill excellent support roles with their natural archery abilities and knowledge of plants. They despise the caves and the unnatural things within...
game:charattribute-temporalGearTLRepairC: +2 Temporal gear cost to repair translocators
game:characterdesc-miner:
Miner description top.

Born for digging, Miners are experts at stone carving and sniffing out precious minerals. However, time underground has detached them from nature.
itemdesc-clothes-upperbody-blacksmith-sh: The thicker material is warm in the cold and keeps the sparks off.

itemdesc-clothes-shoulder-elvish-coat: The craftsmanship is unrivaled. Only the Elves could have stitched this.
